About me

My name's Andrew Boles. I'm a self-taught, full stack web developer who sees a blank webpage as an empty canvas. What I bring are passion, positivity, curiosity, a collaborative attitude, and above all, a balance between the logical and the creative. I went to school for Aerospace Engineering, moved to Detroit to work in Automotive, and moved back home to Texas to become a part of the EV and information explosions. Away from work, I'm an indie rock songwriter and musician who's been lucky enough to play a couple small tours and have our songs featured in a few TV shows. Falling in love with programming has been a welcome symptom of my desire to express myself creatively, and a self-ultimatum to bring that capacity into my professional life. Want to know more? Check out my projects, github, and resume below, then feel free to engage me via LinkedIn or email, and I'd be happy to talk more!
